website_summaries.verdict: Offers a better heat tolerance than you may expect to find in a product with such a low price point.
pros: Capacity of this fat separator cup is 1 liter, creating plenty of versatility in how you use it
All materials in this separator are dishwasher safe
Will adequately handle liquids with temperatures as high as 400 degrees
Side of cup is marked clearly with measurements for milliliters and fractions of cups
cons: Takes some time to clean it thoroughly
Large capacity cup takes up a lot of storage space

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's intended to do...

Even with its 1 liter capacity, it doesn't "work" that large. Plan on multiple batches and dumping of collected, strained product between uses. The rubber stopper for the neck does indeed keep the fat out of the spout. Regarding ease of cleaning, the spout doesn't clean very easily. You might consider a sponge/wand of some sort. The truth is, this product can and will save you significant time in the de-fatting process. Recommended.

product_meta.title: Bellemain 4-Cup Fat Separator/Measuring Cup with Strainer & Fat Stopper / 1 Liter Capacity
feature_bullets: THE MOST DELICIOUS GRAVY? START WITH A HIGH TOP. One thing delicious gravy does not have is a load of fat or grease. This high-top fat separator comes with an innovative high top, designed to make delicious gravy easier by preventing congealed fat from sloshing over your rim during separating.

UPDATED DESIGN FOR EASIEST USE. The best features of leading separators, combined—and improved. With a slip-resistant handle, silicone stopper (for an airtight spout), and a solid-catching strainer at the top that makes pouring your drippings in easier than ever, prepping your favorite broth, sauce and gravy just got a whole lot simpler.

NEARLY INDESTRUCTIBLE. Professionals know that what they put their food into during prep is almost as important as what goes into their food. That’s why we chose heat-resistant (all the way to 400°F), ABS-Free plastic to create our separator: it lets you pour in stock or soup, even when still boiling.

THE BEST GRAVY IN ONE BATCH. With an extremely large 4-Cup (1 Liter) capacity, you’re able to make the whole Thanksgiving gravy in one go. And whether soup, broth, or gravy, our large pouring spout prevents spillages so your family can enjoy every last drop.

PROTECTED FOR 2 YEARS: As a small American business, we treat our customers like we would like to be treated. If you’re not completely happy with any of our products, including this separator, we insist you simply return it to us for a full refund. End of story.
